text: Igael Tumarkin (Hebrew: יגאל תומרקין; 23 October 1933 – 12 August 2021) was an Israeli painter and sculptor. Tumarkin's best known works are the Holocaust and Revival memorial in Rabin Square, Tel Aviv and his sculptures honoring dead soldiers in the Negev. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German sculptors Category:German painters Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Israeli sculptors Category:Israeli painters Category:People from Dresden
title: Igael Tumarkin
